subject: Drag Racing
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Nobile, in his first full season of drag racing in the N.H.R.A., is not getting paid by his team, but he has won two of the last seven events in the pro stock class and has become a sensation.
snippet: Nobile, in his first full season of drag racing in the N.H.R.A., is not getting paid by his team, but he has won two of the last seven events in the pro stock class and has become a sensation.
